```{r}
data<-borowik %>% mutate(delta_ll =standard_best_ll-lasso_first_phase_best_ll, sample_pct_rd = ceiling(as.integer(sample_pct*100)/5),lasso.test.R.2= `lasso_test_R^2` ) %>% dplyr::select(actual_training_size,sample_pct_rd ,sample_pct, number_loci_chosen,lasso_first_phase_best_ll,delta_ll, raxml_lasso_first_phase_vs_standard_rf,lasso.test.R.2) 

data
```

